_gram:
({#yunakti, yuMkte, yuyoja#}, 
{#yuyuje, ayujat, ayOkzIt, ayukta, yokzyati-te#},
{#yoktuM, yukta#})
_meanings:
{@--3@} To furnish or endow with;
as in {#guRayukta#}.
{@--5@} To appoint, set (with <ab>loc.</ab>).

{@--8@} To put, place or
fix on (with <ab>loc.</ab>).

{@--9@} To prepare,
arrange, make ready, fit.

{@--10@} To give,
bestow, confer; {#ASizaM yuyuje#}.

{@--11@}
To adhere or cleave to.

{@--12@} To 
enjoin, charge.
{@--13@} To put in, insert.
{@--14@} To think or medita to upon.

{@--6@} To
be fastened or harnessed.

{@--7@} To 
adhere, to be in close contact.

{@--8@} To
attain to, possess, obtain.

{@--9@} To be
made ready.

{@--2@} To present, give,
bestow; <ls>R. 10. 56.</ls>
{@--5@} To excite, urge, instigate.

{@--6@}
To perform, achieve.

{@--7@} To prepare,
arrange, equip.
{@--8@} To yoke, harness.
{@--9@} To apply, fix, set, place.

{@--10@} To
furnish or endow with.

{@--11@} To 
surround.

{@--12@} To despise, think lightly
of.
{@--13@} To appoint to.
To wish to join, yoke, give &c.

To
unite, join, yoke &c.; see {#yuj#} above.
To censure.
